Kylia Booker (right) watches her younger sister Ja’Bria while spending time at her sisters’ Denton, Texas home Wednesday May 31, 2017. Sisters Ja’Bria and Jessicah use their father’s last name, Roland, while their other three sisters go by their mother’s last name, Booker. (Andy Jacobsohn/Staff Photographer)

Kylia Booker (left) speaks to her younger sister Jessicah while spending time at her sisters’ Denton, Texas home Wednesday May 31, 2017. (Andy Jacobsohn/Staff Photographer)

Jessicah Roland naps while her younger sister, Ja’Bria Roland, uses her device while playing The Sims 3 on PlayStation at their Denton, Texas home Tuesday May 30, 2017. (Andy Jacobsohn/Staff Photographer)

Ja’Bria Roland holds the phone for her older sister Cenecia Booker while Cenecia gets a haircut by shop owner Felicia Griffin at Hair Couture Salon in DeSoto, Texas Friday June 9, 2017. (Andy Jacobsohn/Staff Photographer)

Sisters Kylia Booker (from left), Cenecia Booker and Ciarra Booker spend time together in the home of Cenecia and Ciarra that they share in Denton, Texas with their two youngest sister on Tuesday May 4, 2017. (Andy Jacobsohn/Staff Photographer)

Ciarra Booker (left) looks at her sister Ja'Bria Roland as Ja'Bria uses her phone at their Denton, Texas home Thursday April 13, 2017. (Andy Jacobsohn/Staff Photographer)
